H0.text: Which of the continents is the smallest in area. Europe

H1.text: Which of the continents is the smallest in area. Antarctica

H2.text: Which of the continents is the smallest in area. North America

H3.text: Which of the continents is the smallest in area. Straya

A4.text: Europe is the second-smallest continent (using the seven-continent model)

A5.text: Antarctica is the fifth-largest continent, being about 40% larger than Europe

A6.text: North America is the third-largest continent by size after Asia and Africa

A7.text: The mainland is the world's smallest continent
